channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m 70 and have Alzheimer’s. My son’s girlfriend put $750 worth of lottery tickets on a credit card I gave him. What can I do?
item.description: “I contacted the credit-card company, but was advised they could not reimburse me for the theft.”

item.title: Is Marvell’s stock cheap? This $1 billion move shows the company seems to think so.
item.description: Marvell is doing an accelerated share repurchase that the CEO says signals “conviction in the business and the intrinsic value of our stock.”

item.title: My husband and I put our $1.2 million house in an irrevocable trust. Can we sell the home and buy another one?
item.description: “Do we have to buy a house for equal value or can we buy a less expensive house?”

item.title: New-home sales spike to 3-year high as builders pile on discounts to sell homes
item.description: Sales of new homes posted an unexpected jump in August as builders ramped up discounts and slashed prices to lure buyers.

item.title: ‘I am mentally stuck’: My daughter has a financially reckless spouse. How do I protect her?
item.description: “I am afraid they will end up destitute and homeless.”

item.title: Not just stocks anymore. Wealth firm caters to global rich with art and luxury aircraft
item.description: Corient says globalization creates more opportunities for investors.

item.title: This cybersecurity stock is relatively cheap and has big growth ahead. How to get long with options
item.description: Tony Zhang breaks down the set-up for Fortinet.

item.title: GM shares are moving higher on a UBS upgrade. The firm said the stock is cheap and a big rally is ahead
item.description: UBS upgraded GM shares to buy Wednesday.

item.title: IAS Stock Surges on $1.9 Billion Buyout News: A Wake-Up Call for Ad Tech Investors

item.title: AI can now pass the hardest level of the CFA exam in a matter of minutes
item.description: Previous research had found AI could clear Levels I and II of the CFA exam, but it struggled with Level III, due to the essay questions.

item.title: Nvidia's and OpenAI's 'monumental' data center plan has an equally massive problem: Where to find the power
item.description: Nvidia's and OpenAI's data center plan is so massive that it is unclear whether they can secure the power capacity needed for it.
